<casebody firstpage="167" lastpage="167" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
 <parties id="p-1">
  IN RE: Harry James FOWLER
 </parties>
 <docketnumber id="p-2">
  350P18-1
 </docketnumber>
 <court id="p-3">
  Supreme Court of North Carolina.
 </court>
 <decisiondate id="p-4">
  December 5, 2018
 </decisiondate>
 <attorneys id="p-5">
  Harry James Fowler, for Fowler, Harry James
 </attorneys>
 <opinion id="p-6">
  The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of October 2018 by Plaintiff for De Novo Appeal:
 </opinion>
 <opinion id="p-7">
  "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
 </opinion>
 <opinion type="majority">
  <author id="p-8">
   Ervin, J. recused
  </author>
 </opinion>
</casebody>
